articles.title: Canada not among countries exempt from quarantine for travel into England - CBC.ca
articles.description: The government of the United Kingdom has announced that travellers vaccinated in the European Union and U.S. will not have to quarantine upon entering England — but Canadians will.
articles.content: The government of the United Kingdom announced today that travellers to England who have been vaccinated against COVID-19 in the European Union or United States will be exempt from mandatory quaranti… [+2347 chars]
